original_title: 案山子とラケット　亜季と珠子の夏休み
overview: A 3rd year transfer student from a Tokyo middle school, was emotionally hurt in the soft tennis club she belonged to at her previous school. Unaware of this, Tamako pesters Aki to teach her soft tennis. Together, they go about creating a court on the campus of a closed-down school.
title: Scarecrow and Racket: Aki and Tamako’s Summer Vacation
